mapper.select: SELECT tCount, -- 입소자 수 cCount -- 선택을 완료한 사람 수 FROM (SELECT COUNT(g_no) AS tCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND e_eventdate = #{edate}) wc, (SELECT COUNT(g_no) AS cCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND g_choice IS NOT NULL AND e_eventdate = #{edate}) cc
SELECT MAX(e_eventdate) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY e_eventdate DESC) AS edate FROM TB_Apply WHERE a_cond=8
SELECT e_eventdate AS evdate, e_gisoo AS gisoo FROM TB_Event ORDER BY e_eventdate DESC

SELECT tCount, -- 입소자 수 cCount, -- 선택을 완료한 사람 수 mCount, -- 입소한 남자 수 fCount, -- 입소한 여자 수 cpCount -- 커플된 사람 수. /2할까? FROM (SELECT COUNT(g_no) AS tCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND e_eventdate = #{edate}) wc, (SELECT COUNT(g.g_no) AS mCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE a.e_eventdate = #{edate} AND a.m_no=m.m_no AND g.a_no=a.a_no AND m.m_sex='M') mc, (SELECT COUNT(g.g_no) AS fCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE a.e_eventdate = #{edate} AND a.m_no=m.m_no AND g.a_no=a.a_no AND m.m_sex='F') fc, (SELECT COUNT(g_no) AS cCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND g_choice IS NOT NULL AND e_eventdate = #{edate}) cc, (SELECT COUNT(g_course) AS cpCount FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND g_course IN ('A', 'B', 'C') AND e_eventdate = #{edate}) cpc

SELECT g.g_no AS gno, g.g_choice AS myLove, a.a_pic AS pic, g.g_nick AS nick, g.g_course AS coupling FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND a.m_no=m.m_no AND m.m_sex = 'M' AND a.e_eventdate=#{edate} ORDER BY g.g_nick

SELECT g.g_no AS gno, g.g_choice AS myLove, a.a_pic AS pic, g.g_nick AS nick, g.g_course AS coupling FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND a.m_no=m.m_no AND m.m_sex = 'F' AND a.e_eventdate=#{edate} ORDER BY g.g_nick

SELECT m.m_no AS mno, a.a_no AS ano, g.g_no AS gno, m.m_sex AS sex, g.g_nick AS nick, a.e_eventdate AS evdate, NVL(g.g_choice, -1) AS myLove FROM TB_Member m, TB_Apply a, TB_Guest g WHERE a.m_no=m.m_no AND g.a_no=a.a_no AND a.a_cond = 8 AND m.m_no=#{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_Guest SET g_lunch=#{one} WHERE g_no=( SELECT g_no FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a WHERE g.a_no=a.a_no AND a.m_no=#{mno} AND a.eventdate=#{edate} )
mapper.select: SELECT g.g_no AS gno, a.a_pic AS pic, g.g_nick AS nick FROM TB_Guest g, TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE a.a_no = g.a_no AND m.m_no = a.m_no AND m.m_sex=#{osex} AND a.e_eventdate = #{evdate} ORDER BY g_nick
SELECT lvg.g_nick AS nick, lva.a_pic AS pic FROM TB_Guest myg, TB_Guest lvg, TB_Apply lva WHERE myg.g_no=#{myGno} AND lva.a_no = lvg.a_no AND myg.g_choice=lvg.g_no
